U of A

World Languages

Our Languages

Russian

Courses

Russian language is offered from the elementary (RUSS 1003) through advanced levels (RUSS 3003).If you wish to pursue language learning beyond the fifth semester, you can either do a Study Abroad in Russia, or discuss the option of independent studies or an advanced course with the head of the program. Below are current and upcoming courses, but the complete list of course offerings for the Russian program can be found in the course catalog.

Russian Courses
